caption: MITRE D3FEND™ Tactic
description: The MITRE D3FEND™ Tactic object describes the tactic ID and/or name that is associated to an attack, as defined by D3FENDTM Matrix.
name: d3f_tactic

name.description: The tactic name that is associated with the defensive technique, as defined by D3FENDTM Matrix. For example: Isolate.

src_url.description: The versioned permalink of the defensive tactic, as defined by D3FENDTM Matrix. For example: https://d3fend.mitre.org/tactic/d3f:Isolate/.
